name: Hover Ace
description:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world, where only the fastest and most devastating survive! Fasten in your hovercraft cockpit and prepare for up to 500 km/h velocities. Prove your skills on the arena tracks of Earth, Venus, Mars, and Planet of Glaciers at supersonic derby races.

  • Hovercraft roster includes 15 different models of five types. From speedy scouts to military annihilators. Smash your competitors as well as everything “extra” on the road, and finish first to get cash — you’ll need it for new upgrades, weapons and hovers.
  • Destroy everyone who dares to outrun you! Choose among 12 types of weapons, including machine guns, plasma throwers and rocket systems. Be creative in combining pure might with various gadgets to succeed.
  • Your opposers are 10 unique characters, each with their temper and parameters. Play dirty with the help of a destructible environment, boosters, ramps and shortcuts through track surroundings to make some advantage.
  • Path to the title of superior HoverAce of the Solar System goes through championships, single races, battles for generators, checkpoint contests, races against the clock and survival games. Dominate your opponents on 16 tracks of different planets to triumph in this sci-fi world of astounding speed!
